title: Pope voices 'pain' over Canadian Indigenous deaths, doesn’t apologize
content:
1. Pope voices 'pain' over Canadian Indigenous deaths, doesn’t apologize  The Detroit News
  2. Pope voices 'pain' over Canadian deaths, doesn't apologize  The Associated Press
  3. Cardinal says PM's calls for church to release residential school documents 'uninformed'  CBC News
  4. Canadian Bar Association urges firms to hire more Indigenous lawyers - Canada News  Castanet.net
  5. Bravo Pope Francis, but there's still plenty of work to do  Stuff.co.nz
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Pope voices 'pain' over Canadian Indigenous deaths, doesn’t apologize  The Detroit News

localize.title: ローマ法王、カナダ先住民の死について「痛み」を訴え、謝罪せず
教皇对加拿大土著人的死亡表示 "痛苦"，但没有道歉
